"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a3dad76368722725d70100#post_53a3dad76368722725d70100
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@CogWeaver":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a3d9f3636872265d190200#post_53a3d9f3636872265d190200
Well I'm a big believer in the gospel of "casual sex".
[/bq]

Well... I guess that's _kind of_ true.  But I guess I'd still consider both of those actions to have at least a liiittle bit of romance in them as both are consensual actions, no matter the intentions or desires of either party.  If one were to have _nonconsensual_ sex with someone who happened to be a prostitute or gave the _appearance_ of liking it while still not having actually accepted the other person to be using them in that way, it'd still be rape, no two ways about it.

topics.body:
You know how people constantly talk about what they would do if they had super powers?  Like how if they had super speed or so forth or coming up ways to make money off it?

I just thought of the best abuse for mind control; become the boogey man.  Just like if someone's a bad person or such just give them night terrors and drive them up the walls thinking they're losing their mind.

Like give people like Assad and Kim Jong-Un constant night terrors to the point they're constantly screaming in their sleep and have a vision of a little girl playing with a doll in their sleep singing children's songs and have it consistent so at first everyone thinks it's just that they're losing their minds, but then everyone starts getting terrified when they realize all of them are having the same night terrors.

"In other news Putin has been put in the hospital after he was screaming in his sleep about a little girl singing twinkle twinkle little star.  In other related news Kim Jong-Un was also put in the hospital screaming about a similar nightmare with a little girl singing ashes to ashes.  In other news all of ISIS according to reports is having night terrors containing a little girl singing other notable children's songs"


Not really do anything physical to them or make them do anything; rather make them think they've gone insane and paranoid.
